medical_history.chief_complaint: Recurrent symptoms of right upper quadrant (RUQ) pain after fatty-food consumption.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced two previous episodes of RUQ pain which were less severe and managed with dietary changes. The current episode began suddenly after consuming oatmeal, resulting in severe RUQ and epigastric pain, reduced appetite, and no nausea or emesis. Symptoms worsened over time leading to a referral for further work-up due to leukocytosis and tenderness.
